::Destron Base/Bobertron::

    "Unknown energy signature approaching, suggest immediate activation of 
Autogun systems." The computer suggested to Bobertron.
    "Autoguns online, destroy any signal that isn't recognized." Bobertron 
said to the computer. He then turned to his comm. "Pantron do not return to 
base yet, Autoguns are online and will destroy anything that is not 
recognized."
    He slid on a chair over to a computer consol. He pressed a few keys and 
an image of Magmatron appeared from holoemitters on the out side of the ship. 
(the side that is now uncovered.)
    He started talking. "I am Magmatron, Emperor of Destruction. Stop this 
attack or be destroyed. You will not succeed in this endeavor.
